dialplan.name: Root

machine.play: Hi! Please remember to vote for Homer Simpson this Smarch thirteenth! Thanks!

dialplan.play: Hi! This is the Homer SImpson for mayor campaign calling!

menu.name: Q1
menu.play: This Smarch 13th, will you be voting for Homer Simpson, Nedward Flanders, or are you undecided? For Homer, press 1. For Flanders, press 3. For undecided, press 9.

menu.name: Q2
menu.play: Do you believe indicted outgoing mayor Joe Quimby did a good job in office? Please rate his performance on a scale of 1-10. Press 1 if you think he was just awful. Press 0 for a perfect 10.

menu.name: Q3
menu.play: One last question. Can we count on you to canvass for Homer? Press 1 if you would like to be transferred to our campaign office right now. Press 3 if we should call you back later. Press 9 if you are not interested in helping now.

keypress.play: Great! We will call you back soon!
